Literature.Title: A C-terminal disulfide bridge in pediocin-like bacteriocins renders bacteriocin activity less temperature dependent and is a major determinant of the antimicrobial spectrum.
Literature.Author: Fimland G, Johnsen L, Axelsson L, Brurberg MB, Nes IF, Eijsink VG, Nissen-Meyer J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Loigolactobacillus coryniformis subsp. torquens NCDO 2740(MIC50=0.0003µM),Latilactobacillus sakei NCDO 2714(MIC50=0.0001µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCDO 581(MIC50=0.0003µM),Carnobacterium maltaromaticum UI49(MIC50=0.0001µM),Pediococcus pentosaceus FBB63B(MIC50=0.030µM)
